T02TD2304E:244a-3: lta ba mdor bsdus pa zhes bya ba /
T02TD2304E:244a-4: rdo rje mkha' 'gro la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2304E:244a-5: thams cad mkhyen nyid skyob pa'i gtso //
T02TD2304E:244a-7: lung dang rigs pa'i rjes 'brangs nas //
T02TD2304E:244a-8: dngos don bsdus te gtan la dbab //
T02TD2304E:244a-9: snang zhing srid pa'i chos rnams kun //
T02TD2304E:244a-10: rang rig sems ni gud na med //
T02TD2304E:244a-11: snang zhing gsal ba yin pa'i phyir //
T02TD2304E:244a-12: dper na rang rig nyams myong zhin //
T02TD2304E:244a-13: gal te sems de ma yin na //
T02TD2304E:244a-14: 'brel pa med phyir mi snang thal //
T02TD2304E:244a-15: de lar kun rdzob gtan la dbab //
T02TD2304E:244a-16: chos kun sems la gnas zhes gsungs //
T02TD2304E:244b-0: @244b chos kyi dngos gzhi sems nyid de //
T02TD2304E:244b-1: rigs pa bzhi sogs kyis dpyad kyang //
T02TD2304E:244b-2: dngos po sgra yi cha tsam med //
T02TD2304E:244b-3: dper na nam mkha'i padma bzhin //
T02TD2304E:244b-4: de ltar yod pa ma grub phyir //
T02TD2304E:244b-5: med pa cung zad grub mi 'gyur //
T02TD2304E:244b-6: phan tshun ltos pa nyid kyi phyir //
T02TD2304E:244b-7: tshu rol ma grub pha rol bzhin //
T02TD2304E:244b-8: yod med gnyis ka ma yin te //
T02TD2304E:244b-9: so so nyid du bkag phyir ro //
T02TD2304E:244b-10: gnyis ka med pa ma yin te //
T02TD2304E:244b-11: yod med dngos su 'gal ba'i phyir //
T02TD2304E:244b-12: lus can yang ni ma yin la //
T02TD2304E:244b-13: lus can min pa mi srid phyir //
T02TD2304E:244b-14: des na spros pa thams cad bral //
T02TD2304E:244b-15: de ltar don dam gtan la dbab //
T02TD2304E:244b-16: sems ni nam mkha' la gnas gsungs //
T02TD2304E:244b-17: rang rig spros bral de nyid kyang //
T02TD2304E:244b-18: snang zhing stong la stong zhing snang //
T02TD2304E:244b-19: de phyir snang stong dbyer med de //
T02TD2304E:244b-20: dper na chu yi zla ba bzhin //
T02TD2304E:244b-21: de ltar gnyis med gtan la dbab //
T02TD2304E:244b-22: nam mkha' ci la'ang mi gnas gsungs //
T02TD2304E:244b-23: rang bzhin spros bral de nyid ni //
T02TD2304E:244b-24: rig pa yin phyir gsal ba'o //
T02TD2304E:244b-25: rang rig min phyir mi rtog ste //
T02TD2304E:244b-26: rang rig rang la rtog mi srid //
T02TD2304E:244b-27: rnam par rtog bya min pa'i phyir //
T02TD2304E:244b-28: sems de'i rang bzhin mi rtog nyid //
T02TD2304E:244b-29: gsal ba mi rtog ye shes te //
T02TD2304E:244b-30: dper na bde gshegs ye shes bzhin //
T02TD2304E:244b-31: des na sems nyid 'od gsal la //
T02TD2304E:244b-32: sems ni ye shes yin rtogs na //
T02TD2304E:244b-33: sangs rgyas gzhan du mi btsal gsungs //
T02TD2304E:244b-34: 'on kyang sems de glo bur gyi //
T02TD2304E:244b-35: rnam rtog dri mas nyon mongs te //
T02TD2304E:244b-36: chu dang gser dang nam mkha' ltar //
T02TD2304E:244b-37: gnas skabs dag dang ma dag gnyis //
T02TD2304E:244b-38: rang bzhin 'od gsal sems de dang //
T02TD2304E:244b-39: glo bur rnam rtog dri ma nyis //
T02TD2304E:244b-40: gcig gam tha dad gang yin pa //
T02TD2304E:244b-41: shin tu zab pa chen pa nyid //
T02TD2304E:244b-42: shin tu zab phyir mkhas pas dpyod //
T02TD2304E:244b-43: bshad pa yod kyang ma bris so //
T02TD2304E:244b-44: stong pa de nyid rig pa ses //
T02TD2304E:244b-45: byang chub sems kyang de nyid do //
T02TD2304E:244b-46: sangs rgyas rigs kyang de nyid yin //
T02TD2304E:244b-47: bde gshegs snying po de nyid de //
T02TD2304E:244b-48: de bzhin pa yi ro myang bas //
T02TD2304E:244b-49: bde ba chen po'ang de nyid yin //
T02TD2304E:244b-50: gsang sngags zhes pa'i nyid do //
T02TD2304E:244b-51: thabs dang shes rab de nyid la //
T02TD2304E:244b-52: zab dang rgya che de nyid yin //
T02TD2304E:244b-53: kun bzang yab yum de nyid do //
T02TD2304E:244b-54: nang stong dbyings dang ye shes las //
T02TD2304E:244b-55: ye sangs rgyas zhes de la bya //
T02TD2304E:245a-0: @245a * // dri ma dang bcas rang rig de //
T02TD2304E:245a-1: de yang gzhan la mi ltos phyir //
T02TD2304E:245a-2: rang byung ye shes de nyid do //
T02TD2304E:245a-3: 'khor ba'i dngos gzhi de nyid de //
T02TD2304E:245a-4: mya ngan 'das pa'ang de nyid yin //
T02TD2304E:245a-5: dbu ma chen mo'ang de nyid do //
T02TD2304E:245a-6: mthong bar bya ba de nyid do //
T02TD2304E:245a-7: bsgom par bya ba'ang de nyid do //
T02TD2304E:245a-8: thob par bya ba'ang de nyid do //
T02TD2304E:245a-9: tshad ma'i bden pa'ang de nyid yin //
T02TD2304E:245a-10: rgyu dang thabs dang 'bras bu yi //
T02TD2304E:245a-11: rgyud ni rnam gsum grags pa dang //
T02TD2304E:245a-12: gzhi lam 'bras bur grags pa dang //
T02TD2304E:245a-13: de nyid kyi ni gnas skabs so //
T02TD2304E:245a-14: rgyu rkyen rtsa ba kun gzhi dang //
T02TD2304E:245a-15: 'khor ba ji srid phung po dang //
T02TD2304E:245a-16: gzhan dbang shes pa la sogs grags //
T02TD2304E:245a-18: sems nyid dri ma dang bcas de //
T02TD2304E:245a-20: nam mkha'i khams kyi mtha' klas par //
T02TD2304E:245a-22: rnam rtog dri ma dang bral ba'i //
T02TD2304E:245a-23: rang rig spros bral de nyid ni //
T02TD2304E:245a-24: mig nas mya ngan las 'das pa yin //
T02TD2304E:245a-25: rdo rje sems dpa' 'ang de nyid yin //
T02TD2304E:245a-26: sangs rgyas drug pa'ang de nyid do //
T02TD2304E:245a-27: rigs drug pa'ang de nyid do //
T02TD2304E:245a-28: 'jam dpal gzhon nu'ang de nyid yin //
T02TD2304E:245a-29: rnam par snang mdzad de yin te //
T02TD2304E:245a-30: chos kyi sku dang bde chen dang //
T02TD2304E:245a-31: zung 'jug ces pa de nyid do //
T02TD2304E:245a-32: bzhi pa'i dbang yang de yin te //
T02TD2304E:245a-33: lhan cig skyes dga' de nyid do //
T02TD2304E:245a-34: rang bzhin dag pa'ang de nyid la //
T02TD2304E:245a-35: de la sogs pa mdo rgyud las //
T02TD2304E:245a-36: rnam grangs tha snyad grags pa rnams //
T02TD2304E:245a-37: phal cher de la brten pa yin //
T02TD2304E:245a-38: ji ltar rigs par spyar bar bya //
T02TD2304E:245a-40: sems nyid ri ma med pa de'i //
T02TD2304E:245a-41: rnam 'phrul gzugs skur bsdus pa yi //
T02TD2304E:245a-42: zhing khams rnam par dag pa dang //
T02TD2304E:245a-44: ngo mtshar dngos gzhi de nyid de //
T02TD2304E:245a-45: nam mkha'i mtha' klas khyab par snang //
T02TD2304E:245a-46: rang sems de la rmongs pa yi //
T02TD2304E:245a-47: phyi rol mu stegs ba dag gis //
T02TD2304E:245a-48: bdag dang gtso bo la sogs zhes //
T02TD2304E:245a-49: grub mtha' log pa'i rgya mtshor zhugs //
T02TD2304E:245a-50: rang gi sde pa nyan thos dang //
T02TD2304E:245a-51: rang rgyal sems tsam ba dag gis //
T02TD2304E:245b-0: gnyis med yang dag nyid du rtogs gzhan @245b yang rnam bden rnam brdzun sogs //
T02TD2304E:245b-1: rnam rtog dra bar chud par 'gyur //
T02TD2304E:245b-2: de ltar lta ba ma nor na //
T02TD2304E:245b-3: bsgom pa dang ni spyod pa dag / dngos dang mthun pas byang chub thob //
T02TD2304E:245b-4: dkyus bstan pa yi rta bzhin no //
T02TD2304E:245b-5: lta ba dngos dang ma mthun na //
T02TD2304E:245b-8: dmus long dmigs bu med pa bzhin //
T02TD2304E:245b-9: don dngos rgya mtsho ltar zab pas //
T02TD2304E:245b-10: khron pa'i sbal 'dra bdag gi blos //
T02TD2304E:245b-11: dpyod pas gang rnyed gal la 'gyur //
T02TD2304E:245b-12: nongs gyur mkhas la bzod par gsol //
T02TD2304E:245b-13: 'di byas dge ba gang yin pas //
T02TD2304E:245b-14: skal ldan skye bo dam pa yi //
T02TD2304E:245b-15: 'khrul ba'i dri ma rab spangs nas //
T02TD2304E:245b-16: rtogs pa'i shes ba skye bar shog / rje na ro ba'i lta ba mdor bsdus pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so /
T02TD2304E:245b-18: // / lo ts'a ba mar pa chos kyi blo gros kyi bsgyur cing zhus pa'o//
